title: 2 Old Judge HOFers for sale - Clarkson & Rusie // now in Goodwin Auction

posts.post_title: 2 Old Judge HOFers for sale - Clarkson & Rusie // now in Goodwin Auction
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Frank Wakefield

UPDATE
THESE CARDS, PLUS AN N172 DELAHANTY, WILL BE IN BILL GOODWIN'S NEXT AUCTION WWW.GOODWINANDCO.COM 


I have 2 ungraded N172 Old Judge cards I'm thinking about putting up on eBay... thought I'd see if any of you guys are interested in them first. Both cards are of players in the Hall of Fame.

John Clarkson, Chicago batting

Amos Rusie, Indianapolis right hand head high and spelled correctly

I'm looking for about $800 for Clarkson, $1900 for Rusie. $100 off if you buy both. I'll pay all shipping, insurance, and tracking via USPS. 
Or make an offer, if you get close to that money the cards are yours, and eBay loses a fee. I'll send a few dollars to the man who pays for this site out of his own generous, well intentioned pocket.

My scans of the cards are about 220k, too big to upload, and I am sufficiently pc illiterate to be at a loss for how to attach them to this listing. I am able to attach to emails, and I will email scans to serious buyers. Frank. fwakefield1@comcast.net
